sentences.sContent: She had no notion what he meant.
sentences.sCn: 她根本不明白他是什么意思。

sentences.sContent: ...Isaac asimov evaded the whole notion of morality in devising his three laws of robotics...
...has presented a wide range of examples that undermine the notion that there are any truly fundamental laws of capitalism...
...evidence from cognitive science challenges the notion that skills can exist independent of factual knowledge...
...it conveys a thought-provoking notion that we should effectively protect...
...one of the players that benefits the most from this story are the media: the notion of "extreme" climate simply makes for more compelling news...
...The central notion of social learning theories is that people learn attitudes...

...it conveys a thought-provoking notion that we should always be friendly and polite to other people.First and foremost，a smile proves to be the most effective way to break the ice between two strangers...
...the new measure embraces a relative notion of poverty: people are automatically poor if they're a given distance from the top...
...Were do girls get the notion that they need to be thin in order to be considered beautiful...
...which works by getting girls to understand how they have been buying into the notion that you have to be thin to be happy or successful...
...We also need to abandon the notion that agriculture can be “zero impact”...

remMethod.val: not(知道) ＋ ion(性质) → 知道了 → 有一定概念 → 概念

words.tran: 概念性的；想像的；抽象的；不切实际的
